Name: Meram Cafe
Review Text: The doner is absolutely amazing—consistently!!! I come here multiple times with every trip to Amsterdam. After learning of my obsession with slushies, my boyfriend who is a regular here, mentioned the idea of slushy machines – and they installed them! I was in high heaven. Meram’s earned my loyalty for life!!!
